item.title: Publications
item.description: articles in peer-reviewed journals Biegert, Thomas & Ebbinghaus, Bernhard (forthcoming): Accumulation or absorption? Changing disparities of household non-employment in Europe during the Great Recession. Socio-Econcomic Review. Advance articles. [Link] [Replication files & ungated pre-review version] Biegert, Thomas (2019): Labor Market Institutions, the Insider/Outsider Divide and Social Inequalities in Employment in Affluent Countries. Socio-Economic Review 17(2): 255-281. [Link] Meyer, Brett & Thomas Biegert (2019): The Conditional Effect of Technological Change on Collective Bargaining Coverage.
